faintly."},{"lineNumber":123405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\" way...\""},{"lineNumber":123408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":123409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたはいつまでいる気ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How long do others."},{"lineNumber":123421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":123422,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛が脱衣所で日頃の疲れを吐き出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai was letting out the fatigue of her daily life in the changing room."},{"lineNumber":123423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……毎日目が回るような忙しさだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Every day is dizzyingly busy,"},{"lineNumber":123424,"originalJapaneseLine":"　温泉があるのが唯一の救いね」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the hot spring is my only salvation.\""},{"lineNumber":123425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123426,"originalJapaneseLine":"服を脱ごうとした愛の手が止まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai's hand froze as she tried to undress."},{"lineNumber":123427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123428,"originalJapaneseLine":"脱衣所の隅にある","translatedEnglishLine":"At the corner of the changing room,"},{"lineNumber":123429,"originalJapaneseLine":"一際大きなロッカーを開け放つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"a particularly large locker was thrown open."},{"lineNumber":123430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なにしてるんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":123431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、見つかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I’ve been found out.\""},{"lineNumber":123432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、見つかった……ではなく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, not 'I’ve been found out,' rather—"},

{"lineNumber":123433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、愛ちゃんの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, Ai-chan’s"},

{"lineNumber":123434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　着替えを覗こう作戦失敗だな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"plan to peek at her changing has failed!\""},

{"lineNumber":123435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123436,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統閣下という立場になっても、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even now that you are the Supreme Commander,"},

{"lineNumber":123437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あなたはなにも変わりませんね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you haven’t changed at all...\""},{"lineNumber":123438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、作戦を切り替えて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let’s change strategy,"},

{"lineNumber":123439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛ちゃんと一緒に温泉作戦だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Operation: Hot Spring with Ai-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":123440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあさあ、早く服を脱ぎたまえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, come on, hurry up and take your clothes off.\""},{"lineNumber":123441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、引っ張らないで下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Wait, don’t pull me!\""},{"lineNumber":123442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ちょっと、なにを……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey, what are you...!\""},{"lineNumber":123443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしてこんなことに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How did it come to this...\""},{"lineNumber":123445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーーい、愛ちゃんとお風呂ーお風呂ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay—Bath time with Ai-chan, bath time!\""},{"lineNumber":123446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……相変わらず強引な方ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You’re as pushy as ever.\""},{"lineNumber":123447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は今にも誰か入ってきやしないかと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m nervously wondering if someone might come in any second,"},

{"lineNumber":123448,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒヤヒヤしてるというのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"and yet...\""},{"lineNumber":123449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そいつと三人で入ればいいではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why don’t you all three just bathe together?\""},{"lineNumber":123450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺は心が広いから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, I have a big heart, so...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、私だって……」
「さて、愛ちゃんはこれをどうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, Ai-chan, what will you do with this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん」
ランス達に見守られた中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under the watchful eyes of Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意を決して愛は口を開けて食べた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai mustered her courage, opened her mouth, and ate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、食べた……」
「味はどうだろう？
愛ほどは上手くできないが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t make it as well as Ai can though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、とても……美味しい、です」
「そっか……」
「良かった」
心から安堵の息を漏らして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He let out a sigh of relief from the heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信はほのかに微笑んだ。
「ところで……」
「あなたはいつまでいる気ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How long do you intend to stay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白いから見てく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I find it interesting, so I’ll watch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいでしょう、
これも全て私の不徳の致すところ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is all due to my own shortcomings...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘んじて受けましょう」
「さあ、愛。
あーん」
「あーん……」
愛は一日、謙信達のお世話を受けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai spent the day being cared for by Kenshin and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛が脱衣所で日頃の疲れを吐き出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai was letting out the fatigue of her daily life in the changing room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……毎日目が回るような忙しさだけど、
温泉があるのが唯一の救いね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the hot spring is my only salvation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服を脱ごうとした愛の手が止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai's hand froze as she tried to undress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱衣所の隅にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the corner of the changing room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一際大きなロッカーを開け放つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a particularly large locker was thrown open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なにしてるんですか？」
「あ、見つかった」
「あ、見つかった……ではなく」
「がははは、愛ちゃんの
着替えを覗こう作戦失敗だな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: plan to peek at her changing has failed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統閣下という立場になっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even now that you are the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはなにも変わりませんね……」
「よーし、作戦を切り替えて、
愛ちゃんと一緒に温泉作戦だ」
「さあさあ、早く服を脱ぎたまえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, come on, hurry up and take your clothes off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、引っ張らないで下さい！」
「あっ、ちょっと、なにを……！」
「どうしてこんなことに……」
「わーーい、愛ちゃんとお風呂ーお風呂ー」
「……相変わらず強引な方ですね」
「私は今にも誰か入ってきやしないかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m nervously wondering if someone might come in any second,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒヤヒヤしてるというのに……
「そいつと三人で入ればいいではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why don’t you all three just bathe together?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺は心が広いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, I have a big heart, so..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
